flagsdescription.title: 459.GemsFDTD Flags
flagsdescription.header: These are flags that appear in the benchmark sources, categorized as to whether they are portability candidates, mandatory, or forbidden.
flagsdescription.flag: SPEC_CPU is turned on by the SPEC framework. It is not allowed to undefine this macro. In 459.GemsFDTD, it prevents the OpenMP directives from being visible to the compiler (for SPEC CPU, automatic parallelization is acceptable, but not directive-based parallelization).
